channel.title: objectivity on Nathan Cheever
channel.description: Recent content in objectivity on Nathan Cheever

item.title: Is that True?
item.description: “It’s all relative”. – A relative. Demolition brings a draft Five years ago, I decided it was time for spiritual and intellectual remodeling. I was more excited for the demolition than the rebuilding. My faiths and philosophies were flimsy and distorted. And they needed to go. So I picked up my proverbial wrecking bar and went to town. It was my life and I was determined to search for truth on my own.
